title: The Darkness Abides
description: Two men lie adrift at sea, castaway in the search for one's future, and the other in search of his past. When they drift to a land of perpetual darkness designed as an elaborate labyrinth, they begin to realize that they've stumbled upon the path toward what they each seek, but the trail may be more hazardous than they anticipated.Released initially as a series of short installments, the entirety of this story comprises the length of a full-size novel. Readers who enjoy serialized fiction and dark fantasy with a bit of suspense will enjoy this series.
author: L. Harcroft
